ygData.subject: Singing Steel arms... ALL MINE.
ygData.msgSnippet: Go MoviesGreetings everyone, Just thought I would drop a note.... I got my singing steel arms last night. I couldnt believe it. It was a guild raide and we had
ygData.messageBody:
Go MoviesGreetings everyone,

Just thought I would drop a note.... I got my singing steel arms last night. I couldnt believe it. It was a guild raide and we had 3 bards originally ( the only 3 in the guild) but one had to leave. Down to two. Everyone was getting tired , people started talking about leaving.. So the leader said one more spawn.. OK.. he pulls a named and poof theres the arms... Now I had just gotten a Sebilite Bracer ( 9 ac 4str 4cha only +3 more cha than lambent bracer and looks like chain) mainly cause noone wanted it. So they let me random with the other bard and I rolled a 60 ,, ugh... he rolled a 30 something and was crying all over the floor :).

Im so happy I had to post it... more info below

Tuldar Missednote
50th wood elf bard
Tarew Marr

Found in Sebilis
Singing Steel Vanbraces: 21 AC Effect: Invigor ( refills stamina) can be cast on others.
Mob that Dropped: Froglock Repairer
While camping the Dining room he was pulled from somewhere close but not IN the dining room.

In comparison Lambent Vanbraces : 11 ac 1cha 2 all resist.


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
